Name: O2Jam x DancingParty
About the game: This game is a rhythm game that hits the ball at the exact moment. Let's play with the dancers in front of us to the rhythm. Play with a Dynamic Movement! Full-Body-Experience Game - VR rhythmic games with HTC Vive - the movement of the body induced play - the effects of many movements Motion Capture - Realistic dance animation using motion capture technology - sword dance with various characters using motion data Total Age Group - Rhythmic game content for both men and women of all ages - Play by proficiency through selecting songs by level of difficulty - Optimizing the Key Height UI with VR Devices
